item.title: Anti social behaviour and the broken fence is not helping, 27th February
item.description:
My 93 year old mother in law has had 4 smashed windows caused by 16/17 year old girls (known to police) my niece chased them down the hill where the broken fence was as it leads onto Frobisher estate. This broken fence has been there since at least last october and it is used as a cut through. A wheel clamp was left there, and old mattress and as you can see a shop trolley. Even mothers use as a cut through down the hill with their prams and they would soon be on to the council if they had an accident!!! It has left my mother in law shaken and shocked as she has vascular dementia

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Betsham Road, North End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large containers on the green @ Stuart Mantle Way, Erith, 27th February
item.description:
Large containers & hoarding being put on the green @ Stuart Mantle Way, Erith - this is causing an obstruction to car drivers going up and down the road. She says that Orbit Housing have agreed to this
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stuart Mantle Way, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
